heading: Say Goodbye to Manual Assignment Hassles!
Elevate Your Factory's Productivity with Assign-By-Skill
main.content: Unlock the Potential of Automated Job Allocation

services.title: Precision at Every Assignment
services.description: Scientific algorithms which evaluates all possibilities for optimal assignments, ensuring organizational benefits.

services.title: Boost Productivity
services.description: Eliminate the cumbersome manual assignment which affects productivity during first few hours of the every shift in your factory.

services.title: Streamlined Workflow
services.description: ABS ensures a seamless allocation and shuffling of employees between lines and workstations.

services.title: Fairness at the Core
services.description: ABS ensures that every employee is assigned based on skills, eradicating bias and favoritism.

services.title: Reduce Idle Time
services.description: Assigning your employees before they step into the factory, allowing them to start their work instantly.

services.title: Anytime and Anywhere
services.description: Assign your Employees to various Workstations and Lines in your factory,remotely sitting at your Corporate Office or anywhere in the world.

section1.title: Empowering Your Team
section1.description: ABS is not just a tool, It's a morale booster. By ensuring fair and skill-aligned assignments, ABS empowers your employees, fostering a positive organization culture and boosting morale across the board.

section1.title: Error-Free Assignments
section1.description: Bid farewell to Type I and Type II errors. ABS uses advanced algorithms to prevent Assigning wrong workstation (Type I) or Not Assigning the right workstation (Type II) to employees, ensuring a flawless workflow.

section1.title: Optimal Configuration for Maximum Value
section1.description: ABS guarantees the best possible assignment configurations, maximizing value addition to your operations. Our automated system evaluates all possibilities to implement the most efficient and beneficial configurations.

section2.title: Effortless Assignments
section2.description: Unlock the Potential of Automated Job Allocation.

section2.title: Eliminate Bias
section2.description: A Fair and Objective Assignment mitigating favoritism.

section2.title: Enhance Efficiency
section2.description: Automate the allocation process and concentrate on your Business Criticalties.

section2.title: Experience Flexibility
section2.description: A solution for all your needs in allocation.

link.text: Having queries? We are happy to help you

about.heading: About us
about.topicTop: We are a Professionally Managed Consultancy Firm, based at Chennai, Established by Technocrats, having extensive industry experience and thorough understanding of the challenges faced by businesses.
about.topicBottom: Our mission is to revolutionize employee assignment, improving efficiency and productivity.

items.title: We are committed to address the challenges to transform the ecosystem better than what it is today.

As the saying goes, Machines and Buildings can be there, but without People they are nothing. So We aim to make the professional life of the employees better while improving the Financial Metrics of the Businesses.
We Strongly believe that, To improve results, just monitoring them is not at all sufficient but fixing the Processes is of Prime Importance.
We strive, continuously, to develop innovative and scientific solutions to challenge the challenges of businesses.
And attempting to address one such challenge has led to the birth of our Flagship Solution - ASSIGN-BY-SKILL (ABS)

contact.title: Have any queries?
contact.description: We would love to hear from you. Please fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
